# Finitless Brand Guidelines
# https://brand.finitless.com

> Finitless is an AI ordering agent platform for restaurants.
> This site contains our official brand guidelines and design system.

## Brand Guidelines (Markdown)
For complete brand guidelines in AI-readable format:
https://brand.finitless.com/BRAND-GUIDELINES.md

## Brand Manifest (JSON)
For machine-readable tokens (colors, fonts, spacing):
https://brand.finitless.com/brand-manifest.json

## Key Information

Company: Finitless
Website: https://finitless.com
Product: AI ordering agents for restaurants (voice, WhatsApp, web chat)
Tagline: "Never Miss a Sale. Ever."

### Primary Colors
- Finitless Blue: #165DFC (primary buttons)
- Cyan: #00B7FF (links, gradient start)
- Purple: #7A2EFF (gradient midpoint ONLY)
- Magenta: #C300FF (gradient end ONLY)

### Background Colors
- Base: #0e0e10 (page background)
- Elevated: #151517 (cards, modals)

### Typography
- Font: Inter (Google Fonts)
- Weights: 400, 600, 700, 800

### Border Radius
- Default: 12px
- Small: 8px
- Large: 16px

### Critical Rules
1. ONE gradient CTA button per page
2. Purple and Magenta are gradient-only (never standalone)
3. Always use logo from image assets (never render from font)
4. OAuth buttons use secondary style (never gradient)
